usergroups.php

Summary
usergroups.php
UsergroupsUser groups information
UsergroupsActionAction class for the display of the user groups page, which shows the groups a user belongs to.
titleReturns the page title to be displayed
showPageNoticeDisplays help text for the groups information page in HTML.
showContentDisplays the usergroups that someone is in and some helper text, as HTML
showEmptyListMessageWrites the HTML indicating that a user is not a member of any group

UsergroupsAction

Action class for the display of the user groups page, which shows the groups a user belongs to.

Summary
titleReturns the page title to be displayed
showPageNoticeDisplays help text for the groups information page in HTML.
showContentDisplays the usergroups that someone is in and some helper text, as HTML
showEmptyListMessageWrites the HTML indicating that a user is not a member of any group

title

function title()

Returns the page title to be displayed

showPageNotice

function showPageNotice()

Displays help text for the groups information page in HTML.

showContent

function showContent()

Displays the usergroups that someone is in and some helper text, as HTML

showEmptyListMessage

function showEmptyListMessage()

Writes the HTML indicating that a user is not a member of any group

function title()
Returns the page title to be displayed
function showPageNotice()
Displays help text for the groups information page in HTML.
function showContent()
Displays the usergroups that someone is in and some helper text, as HTML
function showEmptyListMessage()
Writes the HTML indicating that a user is not a member of any group
